recommendations: Andrea T. Edwards, CSP ‚ÄúIt was such a privilege and a pleasure to work with Kanika in her first professional year at Microsoft. An intelligent, inspired and passionate woman, she is going to have an amazing career if she always remember to follow her passion and work with great people who embrace her spirit and understand that keeping her light alive is what is critical to future success. I know I'll enjoy watching Kanika kick goals every step of the way in the coming decades. When I think of Kanika, I know a star has been born, and I was thrilled to be there at the beginning of her career journey. Definitely one to watch!‚Äù

Anna McMahon nee Fourie ‚ÄúKanika joined our team originally as an intern. What impressed us was her unique skills as a comms specialist combined with university studies as a computer engineer. Kanika is also very talented when it comes to hosting events and public speaking. She presents confidently to large audiences and knows how to motivate the crowd.‚Äù
